name: AWS CloudTrail Lake
overview: Send LaunchDarkly audit events to AWS CloudTrail Lake.
description: AWS CloudTrail Lake integration lets you configure CloudTrail Lake to receive any activity from LaunchDarkly and store the data in CloudTrail Lake.
author: LaunchDarkly

formVariables.name: External Id
formVariables.description: Provide this for your resource policy when setting up the integration in the AWS Console.

formVariables.name: Channel ARN
formVariables.description: Enter the Channel ARN for LaunchDarkly to use.
